item.title: 中国 CATL 在香港上市首日股价将大涨 12.5%
item.description: 中国电池巨头 CATL 在香港上市融资 46 亿美元，创下今年全球同类上市融资规模之最，该公司股价周二将上涨约 12.5%。【原文：Shares of China battery giant CATL are set to rise about 12.5% on Tuesday after the company raised $4.6 billion in its Hong Kong listing, the largest of its kind in the world this year.】

item.title: 税改投票前美元横盘，澳大利亚央行会议前澳元保持涨势
item.description: 由于美联储对经济持谨慎态度，以及美国立法者接近通过一项预计将扩大国家财政赤字的法案，美元在连续一周走低后于周二横盘整理。【原文：The dollar traded sideways on Tuesday after having glided lower for a week, hemmed in by the Fed's caution over the economy and as U.S. lawmakers came closer to passing a bill expected to widen the nation's fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 美国与伊朗核谈判摇摆不定的迹象导致油价上涨
item.description: 由于美国和伊朗关于德黑兰核计划的谈判可能破裂，以及更多伊朗石油供应进入全球市场的前景减弱，周二油价略有上涨。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Tuesday on a potential breakdown in talks between the U.S. and Iran over Tehran's nuclear program and the weakened prospects of more Iranian oil supplies entering the global market.】

item.title: 据当地媒体报道，巴西反垄断机构将批准 Petz 和 Cobasi 合并案
item.description: 据当地新闻媒体《巴西日报》周一援引消息人士的话报道，巴西反垄断机构 Cade 将于本周无限制地批准两家宠物产品零售商 Cobasi 和 Petz 的合并。【原文：Brazil's antitrust body Cade is set to approve this week, without restrictions, the merger of two retailers of products for pets, Cobasi and Petz , local news outlet Brazil Journal reported on Monday, citing sources.】

item.title: 辉瑞与中国 3SBio 签订价值 60 亿美元的抗癌药物许可协议
item.description: 美国辉瑞制药公司周一表示，已与中国医药产品开发商三生制药公司（3SBio Inc）签署了一项价值高达 60 亿美元的许可协议，用于开发、生产和商业化一种正在试验中的治疗某些类型癌症和肿瘤的药物。【原文：Pfizer has signed a licensing agreement worth up to $6 billion with Chinese pharmaceutical products developer 3SBio Inc for the development, manufacturing and commercialization of a drug undergoing trials for treatment of certain types of cancer and tumours, the U.S. drugmaker said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国建设银行下调存款利率
item.description: 中国建设银行周二下调了存款利率，这是中国国有银行在中国政府推出全面货币宽松措施以帮助整体经济之际，为缓解贷款机构息差缩小而采取的预期举措之一。【原文：China Construction Bank cut deposit rates on Tuesday, part of an expected move by Chinese state-owned banks to alleviate shrinking interest margins at lenders as Beijing rolls out sweeping monetary easing measures to aid the broad economy.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 获加州批准在旧金山湾区扩张
item.description: Alphabet 的自动驾驶部门 Waymo 周一表示，它已获得加利福尼亚州的批准，可以在旧金山半岛的更多地区以及包括圣何塞在内的更南部地区扩大其机器人出租车业务。【原文：Alphabet's self-driving unit Waymo said on Monday it received approval from California to expand its robotaxi operations in more areas of the San Francisco Peninsula and further south, including San Jose.】

item.title: 美国石油生产商大陆资源公司声称赫斯公司诈骗了 6900 万美元
item.description: 美国页岩油气生产商大陆资源公司（Continental Resources）对赫斯公司（Hess Corp）提起诉讼，指控该油井运营商与其子公司进行的一系列交易骗取了其高达 6900 万美元的资金。【原文：U.S. shale producer Continental Resources has filed a lawsuit against Hess Corp alleging that it was defrauded out of up to $69 million through a series of deals the well operator conducted with its subsidiaries.】

item.title: 随着 "美国品牌 "进一步失宠，美元将进一步走软
item.description: 与贸易有关的不确定性、不断膨胀的财政债务以及对美国持久特殊性的信心减弱，都对美国资产造成了压力，美元就是其中的一个牺牲品。投资者认为，随着美元从高估值中回落，美元将失去更多光彩。【原文：Trade-related uncertainties, ballooning fiscal debt and weakened confidence about enduring U.S. exceptionalism have weighed on U.S. assets, with the dollar one casualty. Investors see the currency losing more of its luster as the greenback comes back to earth from lofty valuations.】

item.title: 爱娃技术公司为空客自动门滑行测试提供传感器
item.description: Aeva Technologies 公司周一表示，它正在向欧洲飞机制造商空中客车公司的一家子公司提供传感器，该公司正致力于开发可自动滑行到机场登机口的飞机。【原文：Aeva Technologies said on Monday it is supplying sensors to a subsidiary of European aircraft manufacturer Airbus that is working to develop planes that can taxi to airport gates autonomously.】

item.title: GDI 再融资 1150 万美元，扩大电动汽车电池阳极的生产规模
item.description: 电池材料初创公司 GDI 周二表示，该公司已在 A 轮融资中额外筹集了 1150 万美元，用于在美国和欧洲扩大电动汽车电池硅阳极的生产规模。【原文：Battery materials startup GDI said on Tuesday it has raised an additional $11.5 million in Series A funding to scale up production of silicon anodes for electric vehicle batteries in the United States and Europe.】

item.title: Equinor 称美国解除了对纽约海上风电场的停工令
item.description: 该项目开发商周一表示，特朗普政府解除了对纽约海岸计划中的一个大型海上风电设施长达一个月的停工令。【原文：The Trump administration lifted a month-old stop-work order on a major offshore wind facility planned off the coast of New York, the project's developer said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国将宣布拜登燃油经济性规定超越法律权限
item.description: 汽车制造商周一表示，美国交通部预计将宣布，时任总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）时期颁布的燃油经济性规则将电动汽车纳入规则制定范围，这超出了政府的法定权限。【原文：The U.S. Transportation Department is expected to declare that fuel economy rules issued under then President Joe Biden exceeded the government's legal authority by including electric vehicles in setting the rules, automakers said on Monday.】

item.title: 央行机构国际清算银行（BIS）指出美元争夺战的可能性
item.description: 央行机构国际清算银行（Bank for International Settlements）表示，在美国经济动荡之际，如果投资者开始在113万亿美元的外汇掉期市场平仓，可能会引发对美元的争夺。【原文：Central bank body the Bank for International Settlements has flagged a possible scramble for dollars could be triggered if whipsawed investors begin to unwind positions in the $113 trillion FX swap market amid U.S. volatility.】

item.title: 通用汽车公司表示将停止从美国向中国出口汽车
item.description: 通用汽车公司上周末通知其中国出口业务的员工和经销商，该公司将停止从美国向中国运输汽车。【原文：General Motors late last week informed employees and dealers for its China export business it would stop shipping vehicles to China from the United States, the company said.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 Vanguard 与共同基金投资者达成的 4000 万美元和解协议
item.description: 周一，一名联邦法官驳回了先锋集团（Vanguard Group）与投资者达成的 4000 万美元和解协议，投资者声称先锋集团在其广受欢迎的目标日期共同基金（target-date mutual funds）中向他们收取了高额税费。【原文：A federal judge on Monday rejected Vanguard Group's $40 million settlement with investors who claimed it stuck them with inflated tax bills in its popular target-date mutual funds.】

item.title: 普拉特发动机罢工工人将于周四与 RTX 恢复谈判
item.description: RTX 公司和工会发言人周一表示，随着停工事件持续到第三周，RTX 公司和代表约 3000 名罢工的美国普惠公司工人的工会将于周四恢复谈判。【原文：RTX and the union representing around 3,000 striking U.S. Pratt & Whitney workers are resuming talks on Thursday as the stoppage continues in its third week, spokespeople for both the company and union said on Monday.】

item.title: Dollar Tree 重新任命资深人士 MacNaughton 担任分拆后的 Family Dollar 首席执行官
item.description: Dollar Tree 周一任命零售业资深人士邓肯-麦克诺顿（Duncan MacNaughton）担任 Family Dollar 连锁店的首席执行官。【原文：Dollar Tree on Monday named retail industry veteran Duncan MacNaughton as the chief executive officer of the Family Dollar chain, which is in the process of being bought by a group of private-equity investors for about $1 billion.】

item.title: 交易日：应对美国降级
item.description: 了解推动全球市场的各种力量【原文：Making sense of the forces driving global markets】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，美国司法部对 Coinbase 最近的加密攻击展开调查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，美国司法部已开始调查全球最大加密货币交易所 Coinbase Global 最近发生的漏洞事件。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice has opened a probe into a recent breach at the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global , Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 联邦快递任命内部人士约翰-史密斯领导货运分拆业务
item.description: 快递巨头联邦快递（FedEx）周一表示，已任命内部人士约翰-史密斯（John Smith）担任其货运卡车分拆公司联邦快递货运公司（FedEx Freight）的首席执行官。【原文：Delivery giant FedEx said on Monday it has appointed insider John Smith as CEO of its freight trucking spinoff, FedEx Freight.】

item.title: 美国最繁忙的海港首席执行官表示，不太可能出现与关税相关的货运热潮
item.description: 美国最繁忙港口的负责人预计，在上周华盛顿和中国政府达成关税休战协议，将关税从 145% 暂时降至 30% 之后，进口量不会激增。【原文：The head of the busiest U.S. port does not expect imports to soar after last week's tariff truce between Washington and Beijing that temporarily lowered the duty to 30% from 145%.】

item.title: 美国预计不会在 G7 会议上达成贸易协议--消息人士
item.description: 一位了解美国参会情况的消息人士称，美国财政部预计本周在加拿大举行的七国集团（G7）财长和央行行长会议不会宣布任何贸易协议。【原文：The U.S. Treasury does not anticipate any trade deal announcements as part of a G7 finance ministers and central bank governors meeting this week in Canada, a source briefed on U.S. participation in the meeting said.】

item.title: 独家报道斯巴鲁美国公司以 "市场条件 "为由提高汽车价格
item.description: 斯巴鲁美国公司（Subaru of America）周一表示，该公司将提高其几款车型的价格，这是最近一家汽车制造商因特朗普政府征收关税导致消费者支出增加而将成本增加转嫁给消费者。【原文：Subaru of America is hiking prices on several of its models, the company said on Monday, the latest automaker to pass along cost increases to consumers as their expenses rise from the Trump administration's tariffs.】

item.title: 美国信用评级下调后，穆迪下调摩根大通、美国银行和富国银行评级
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）周一下调了摩根大通、美国银行和富国银行等美国顶级贷款机构的长期评级，因其不断膨胀的36万亿美元债务而将美国挤出了顶级三A评级俱乐部。【原文：Moody's on Monday downgraded the long-term ratings of top American lenders such as JPMorgan Chase , Bank of America and Wells Fargo , after pushing the U.S. out of top triple-A rating club over its burgeoning $36 trillion debt.】

item.title: 企业债券市场对穆迪下调美国评级反应平淡
item.description: 穆迪（Moody）周五晚些时候下调美国主权信用评级似乎对周一的企业债券市场活动产生了一定影响，因为利差略有扩大，本周开始的新债券销售也比预期的要逊色。【原文：Moody's downgrade of the U.S. sovereign credit rating late Friday appeared to have a modest impact on corporate bond market activity on Monday, as spreads widened slightly and new bond sales started the week softer than expected.】

item.title: 达美航空可就电脑故障导致 7,000 架次航班取消起诉 CrowdStrike
item.description: 佐治亚州一名法官裁定，达美航空公司可以继续进行诉讼，要求网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 为去年 7 月导致该航空公司取消 7000 个航班的大规模计算机故障负责。【原文：Delta Air Lines can pursue much of its lawsuit seeking to hold cybersecurity company CrowdStrike liable for a massive computer outage last July that caused the carrier to cancel 7,000 flights, a Georgia state judge ruled.】

item.title: 消息人士称，能源投资者 Five Point 目标从北风输油管道销售中获利 20 亿美元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，北风中游公司的私募股权所有者正在探索出售这家二叠纪盆地天然气基础设施运营商的可能性，任何交易的价值（包括债务）预计都在 20 亿美元左右。【原文：The private equity owner of Northwind Midstream is exploring a potential sale of the Permian Basin gas infrastructure operator, with any deal expected to value the company at around $2 billion including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国商务部长卢特尼克将 Cantor Fitzgerald 股份转让给子女
item.description: 华尔街公司 Cantor Fitzgerald 周一表示，美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克同意将其在该公司的股份转让给他的子女和一群投资者，并剥离了两家子公司的资产，遵守了他的美国政府道德协议。【原文：Wall Street firm Cantor Fitzgerald said on Monday that U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick agreed to transfer his stake in the firm to his children and a group of investors, and divested assets in two subsidiaries, complying with his U.S. government ethics agreement.】

item.title: 美国上周原油和产品库存可能下降 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周一的初步调查显示，上周美国原油库存可能下降，馏分油和汽油库存也可能下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles likely fell last week, along with distillate and gasoline inventories, a preliminary Reuters poll found on Monday.】
